userInterface

Class UI

  • java.lang.Object
    • userInterface.UI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Singleton<UI>

    public class UI
extends java.lang.Object
implements Singleton<UI>, java.io.Closeable
    A user interface that is responsible for handling interactions between the user and the data.
    Author:
    Joshua Zierman [py1422xs@metrostate.edu]
